name: THE SUS ROOMS
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

After finding yourself in a mysterious maze, you have to find a way out. However, all of your favorite Sonic posters are missing! You must find all five or your missing posters and make your way to the exit. Heads up, you are not alone.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

SHIFT - Sprint

E - Interact

EXTRA INFORMATION:

This game was fully made other the span of five days, not for any game jam, just because. So don't expect anything perfect. Also, I'm unable to test the Mac version so if it doesn't work, oops!
